overview:
Andy Aplin has worked in the IT Data Industry for over 20 years, during this time, he has worked up through the ranks from Technical Support to Technical Director, and was one the first engineers to gain Cisco CCIE’s Accreditation is 1995. Andy has worked for a number of major vendors, including Alcatel, Bay Networks, Cisco and was the first European technical hire for Blue Coat during their IPO in 1998.

In 2003 Andy was one of the founders of Intrinsic Networks. Intrinsic Networks was created to address the rise of the Data Communications in the mobile service provider market, Intrinsic Networks was sold to Matrix Communications Plc. in 2005, Andy was then appointed Technical Director of the Mobile Service provider division “Fujin Technology”. In 2007 Andy completed the MBO of Fujin Technology and went on to sell this in 2010.
